name: Baseline
overview: A spaceship is on a mission: it flies over enemy bases and is subjected to fire from the base and must avoid flying objects, for impact with them can destroy your craft. The action begins in a path limited by two walls which must not be touched. you will need to be a master pilot to avoid the walls, enemy fire and craft. You have three lives to get you to the end of the challenge. Published in Italy as Moonbase in Logica 2000 n.90 (1989).
